getAllCouponsWhereTypeIs(String) - Method in interface Coupon.Progect.CouponProject.Services.UtilityService
 
getAllCouponsWhereTypeIs(String) - Method in class Coupon.Progect.CouponProject.Services.UtilityServiceImpl
getAllCouponsWhereTypeIs method get a string that contains either a location , a location and type or location and type and id . . in case the location = "main" it will return a list of coupons with the type provided with max size of 8. in case the location = "category" it will return a list of all coupons with the type provided.
